newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: PLDT satellite unit sets capital increase.
newsitem.headline: PLDT satellite unit sets capital increase.

text.p: ACeS Philippines Cellular Corp, a unit of Philippine Long Distance Telephone Co (PLDT), said on Friday its shareholders have agreed to increase its authorised capital to three billion pesos from 1.3 billion pesos.
In an amended articles of incorporation, ACeS said PLDT has subscribed to the entire 17 million shares with a par value of 100 pesos per share.
Aside from PLDT, cellular phone firm Pilipino Telephone Corp also has a stake in ACeS Philippines.
ACeS is the communications satellite subsidiary of PLDT.
